oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Diels-Alder approach for the synthesis of highly functionalized benzo-annulated indane-based α-amino acid derivatives via a sultine intermediate
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, SAMBASIVARAO
GHOSH, ARUN KUMAR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cycloaddition
amino acids
derivatives
synthesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The synthesis of various highly functionalized benzo-annulated indane-based α-amino acid (AAA) derivatives are reported via a [4+2] cycloaddition strategy using a sultine derivative, containing an AAA moiety, as a reactive diene component. By adopting this strategy, a new α,α-dialkylated indane-based C60 fullerene containing a constrained AAA unit is reported.
